title: Opinion: The death of Play Movies pushes Google TV forward, but emphasizes YouTube’s awful experience
content:
This week, Google announced another step towards the end of Play Movies & TV as it continues to push towards Google TV instead. It’s the right call, but with a headache attached for many customers.

more…

The post Opinion: The death of Play Movies pushes Google TV forward, but emphasizes YouTube’s awful experience appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The death of Google Play Movies is a needed step for Google TV, but it means more people will be subjected to YouTube's awful alternative.
